paper_title.en: Chronic inhibition of the norepinephrine transporter in the brain participates in seizure sensitization to cocaine and local anesthetics

description.en: The involvement of chronic inhibition of monoamine transporters (MAT) in the brain with respect to sensitization to cocaine- and local anesthetic-induced seizures was studied in mice. Repeated administration of subconvulsive doses of meprylcaine as well as cocaine, both of which inhibit MAT, but not lidocaine, which does not inhibit MAT, increased seizure activity and produced sensitization to other local anesthetics. The effects of five daily treatments of monoamine transporter inhibitors on lidocaine-induced convulsions were examined 2 or 3 days after the last dose of the inhibitors. Daily treatments of GBR 12935, a specific inhibitor of dopamine uptake, significantly increased the incidence and the intensity of lidocaine-induced convulsions at 20 mg/kg and decreased the threshold of the convulsions. Daily treatments of desipramine and maprotiline, selective norepinephrine uptake inhibitors, markedly increased the incidence and intensity of lidocaine-induced convulsions, and decreased the threshold in a dose-dependent manner at between 5 and 20 mg/kg. Daily treatments of citalopram, a selective serotonin uptake inhibitor, at 10 and 20 mg/kg, produced no significant increase in the incidence or intensity of lidocaine-induced convulsions, but decreased the threshold of the convulsions. These results suggest that the chronic intermittent inhibition of monoamine uptake increases susceptibility to cocaine- and local anesthetic-induced seizures, and the norepinephrine transporter is an integral component of this sensitization. © 2002 Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Chronic inhibition of the norepinephrine transporter in the brain participates in seizure sensitization to cocaine and local anesthetics

description.en: The involvement of chronic inhibition of monoamine transporters (MAT) in the brain with respect to sensitization to cocaine- and local anesthetic-induced seizures was studied in mice. Repeated administration of subconvulsive doses of meprylcaine as well as cocaine, both of which inhibit MAT, but not lidocame, which does not inhibit MAT, increased seizure activity and produced sensitization to other local anesthetics. The effects of five daily treatments of monoamine transporter inhibitors on lidocame-induced convulsions were examined 2 or 3 days after the last dose of the inhibitors. Daily treatments of GBR 12935, a specific inhibitor of dopamine uptake, significantly increased the incidence and the intensity of lidocame-induced convulsions at 20 mg/kg and decreased the threshold of the convulsions. Daily treatments of desipramine and maprotiline, selective norepinephrine uptake inhibitors, markedly increased the incidence and intensity of lidocaine-induced convulsions, and decreased the threshold in a dose-dependent manner at between 5 and 20 mg/kg. Daily treatments of citalopram, a selective serotonin uptake inhibitor, at 10 and 20 mg/kg, produced no significant increase in the incidence or intensity of lidocaine-induced convulsions, but decreased the threshold of the convulsions. These results suggest that the chronic intermittent inhibition of monoamine uptake increases susceptibility to cocaine- and local anesthetic-induced seizures, and the norepinephrine transporter is an integral component of this sensitization. (C) 2002 Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.

paper_title.ja: 冊子「目薬Q&A-正しい目薬の使い方-」の作成とその成果
薬薬連携（病院薬局・保険薬局）に関するアンケート調査報告

description.ja: 平成14年7月に広島県病院薬剤師会々員所属全施設を対象に行った,以下の事項を問うアンケートの結果を報告した.1)県病薬所属支部,2)病棟数,3)診療科数,4)薬剤師数,5)1日平均外来処方箋枚数(院内と院外),6)1日平均入院処方箋枚数,7)1日平均注射処方箋枚数,8)薬剤管理指導業務の実施,9)無菌製剤処理加算業務の実施,10)TDM業務の実施,11)外来薬剤提供の実施,12)お薬手帳の発行,13)治験業務の実施,14)在宅医療への関与,15)輸血用血液(MAPなど)の管理,16)薬学生卒前・卒後実習の受け入れ,17)院外処方箋を応需している保険薬局数,18)薬剤部での事前チェック(監査),19)事前監査の責務,20)疑義照会時の一次対応部門,21)どこが一次対応すべきか,22)保険薬局との連絡ツール,23)保険薬局からの情報のフィードバック,24)保険薬局への情報提供,25)処方箋に記載する医薬品の制限,26)記載する医薬品に制限を設けるべきか,27)合同会議,勉強会の機会

publication_name.ja: 広島県病院薬剤師会誌

paper_title.ja: 抗菌薬の皮膚反応テスト添付文書の比較検討
TDM学会セミナーの有用度調査-参加者の意識調査から-

description.ja: 第23回日本TDM(薬物血中濃度モニタリング)学会セミナーの受講者99名,体験実習参加者26名に対してアンケート調査を行った.受講群では,セミナーに期待するものとして全員がTDM業務の進め方を挙げ,この他複数回答で67名がTDM理論の解説,59名がデータ解析の演習を望んでいた.又,83名が「実習が必要である」と回答した.多変量解析の結果,セミナーの有用度に影響する因子として「職場の形態」と「TDMの経験年数」が抽出され,TDM経験者はセミナーを有用と考えているのに対し未経験者はそうではない傾向が見受けられた.体験実習参加群では半数以上が「測定ができる迄に何度かの練習が必要」と答えた

paper_title.en: Investigation of package inserts for physicians in skin test kits dor detecting allergies to antibiotic agents in Japan

paper_title.en: The Role of Clinical Pharmacists in Emergency Medicine

paper_title.ja: 危機管理業務に関する要因の検討
本邦における緑内障点眼薬とそのコスト評価

description.ja: 医師が患者に対して緑内障点眼薬を処方する際は,患者の病状と点眼薬の薬効を考えて処方するのが大原則である.しかし,緑内障は生涯にわたって治療を続けなければならないので,患者の医療費負担は大きなものとなる.又,現在は,社会的な面からも医療費の削減の必要性が叫ばれている.このような状況を考えると,今後は点眼薬の薬効に加えて薬剤の経済的評価も薬剤選択の判断材料にする必要があるかもしれない.特に同じ薬効の薬剤である場合はその必要性が高いと思われる.代表的な緑内障治療薬の薬剤コストについて説明した
